property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb
property.description: Amount of physical memory, in MB, that can be allocated for containers.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb
property.description: The maximum allocation for every container request at the RM, in MBs. Memory requests higher than this won't take effect, and will get capped to this value.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb
property.description: The minimum allocation for every container request at the RM, in MBs. Memory requests lower than this won't take effect, and the specified value will get allocated at minimum.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores
property.description: Number of vcores that can be allocated for containers. This is used by the RM scheduler when allocating resources for containers. This is not used to limit the number of physical cores used by YARN containers.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable
property.description: Enable remote logs aggregation to the default FS.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir
property.description: The remote path, on the default FS, to store logs.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.recovery.enabled
property.description: Enable RM to recover state after starting.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.fs.state-store.uri
property.description: URI pointing to the location of the FileSystem path where RM state will be stored. This is set on the local file system to avoid collisions in GCS.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs
property.description: Directories on the local machine in which to application temp files.
